segment.source: Application Virtualization Client Hardware and Software Requirements
segment.target: Application Virtualization Client Hardware and Software Requirements

segment.source: Application Virtualization Client Hardware and Software Requirements
segment.target: Application Virtualization Client Hardware and Software Requirements

segment.source: Application Virtualization Client Hardware and Software Requirements
segment.target: Application Virtualization Client Hardware and Software Requirements

segment.source: This topic describes the recommended minimum hardware and software configuration for the installation of the Application Virtualization Desktop Client and the Application Virtualization Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).
segment.target: This topic describes the recommended minimum hardware and software configuration for the installation of the Application Virtualization Desktop Client and the Application Virtualization Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).

segment.source: The following list includes the recommended minimum hardware and software requirements for the Application Virtualization Desktop Client.
segment.target: The following list includes the recommended minimum hardware and software requirements for the Application Virtualization Desktop Client.

segment.source: The requirements are listed first for Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 SP2, followed by the requirements for versions that preceded App-V 4.6 SP2.
segment.target: The requirements are listed first for Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 SP2, followed by the requirements for versions that preceded App-V 4.6 SP2.

segment.source: The Application Virtualization (App-V) Desktop Client requires no additional processor or RAM resources beyond the requirements of the host operating system.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization (App-V) Desktop Client requires no additional processor or RAM resources beyond the requirements of the host operating system.

segment.source: The hardware requirements requirements are applicable to all versions.
segment.target: The hardware requirements requirements are applicable to all versions.

segment.source: Processor—See recommended system requirements for the operating system you are using.
segment.target: Processor—See recommended system requirements for the operating system you are using.

segment.source: RAM—See recommended system requirements for the operating system you are using.
segment.target: RAM—See recommended system requirements for the operating system you are using.

segment.source: Disk—30 MB for installation and 6 GB for the cache.
segment.target: Disk—30 MB for installation and 6 GB for the cache.

segment.source: The following software prerequisites are installed automatically if you are using the Setup.exe method.
segment.target: The following software prerequisites are installed automatically if you are using the Setup.exe method.

segment.source: If you are using the Setup.msi installation program, the following products must be installed first.
segment.target: If you are using the Setup.msi installation program, the following products must be installed first.

segment.source: Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86), see Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119961).
segment.target: Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86), see Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119961).

segment.source: For version 4.5 SP2 of the App-V client, download Vcredistx86.exe from Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Service Pack 1 Redistributable Package ATL Security Update (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169360).
segment.target: For version 4.5 SP2 of the App-V client, download Vcredistx86.exe from Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Service Pack 1 Redistributable Package ATL Security Update (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169360).

segment.source: Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86), see Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=63266).
segment.target: Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86), see Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=63266).

segment.source: For the Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 Desktop Client, the following additional software prerequisite is installed automatically if you are using the Setup.exe method.
segment.target: For the Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 Desktop Client, the following additional software prerequisite is installed automatically if you are using the Setup.exe method.

segment.source: If you are using the Setup.msi installation program, you must also install with the other prerequisites listed.
segment.target: If you are using the Setup.msi installation program, you must also install with the other prerequisites listed.

segment.source: Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86), see Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=150700).
segment.target: Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86), see Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=150700).

segment.source: Software Requirements for Versions that Precede App-V 4.6 SP2
segment.target: Software Requirements for Versions that Precede App-V 4.6 SP2

segment.source: No service pack, SP1, or SP2
segment.target: No service pack, SP1, or SP2

segment.source: ¹Supported for App-V 4.5 SP1 and SP2, App-V 4.6 and 4.6 SP1 only
segment.target: ¹Supported for App-V 4.5 SP1 and SP2, App-V 4.6 and 4.6 SP1 only

segment.source: The Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 Desktop Client supports 32-bit and 64-bit versions of these operating systems.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 Desktop Client supports 32-bit and 64-bit versions of these operating systems.

segment.source: The following software prerequisites are installed automatically if you are using the Setup.exe method.
segment.target: The following software prerequisites are installed automatically if you are using the Setup.exe method.

segment.source: If you are using the Setup.msi installation program, the following products must be installed first.
segment.target: If you are using the Setup.msi installation program, the following products must be installed first.

segment.source: Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86), see Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119961).
segment.target: Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86), see Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119961).

segment.source: For version 4.5 SP2 of the App-V client, download Vcredistx86.exe from Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Service Pack 1 Redistributable Package ATL Security Update (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169360).
segment.target: For version 4.5 SP2 of the App-V client, download Vcredistx86.exe from Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Service Pack 1 Redistributable Package ATL Security Update (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169360).

segment.source: Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86), see Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=63266).
segment.target: Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86), see Microsoft Core XML Services (MSXML) 6.0 SP1 (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=63266).

segment.source: Microsoft Application Error Reporting—The installation program for this software is included in the SupportWatson folder in the self-extracting archive file.
segment.target: Microsoft Application Error Reporting—The installation program for this software is included in the SupportWatson folder in the self-extracting archive file.

segment.source: For the Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 Desktop Client, the following additional software prerequisite is installed automatically if you are using the Setup.exe method.
segment.target: For the Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 Desktop Client, the following additional software prerequisite is installed automatically if you are using the Setup.exe method.

segment.source: If you are using the Setup.msi installation program, you must also install with the other prerequisites listed.
segment.target: If you are using the Setup.msi installation program, you must also install with the other prerequisites listed.

segment.source: Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86), see Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=150700).
segment.target: Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)—For more information about installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86), see Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=150700).

segment.source: Application Virtualization Client for Remote Desktop Services
segment.target: Application Virtualization Client for Remote Desktop Services

segment.source: Following are the recommended hardware and software requirements for the Application Virtualization Client for Remote Desktop Services.
segment.target: Following are the recommended hardware and software requirements for the Application Virtualization Client for Remote Desktop Services.

segment.source: The requirements are listed first for appv4613, followed by the requirements for versions that preceded App-V 4.6 SP2.
segment.target: The requirements are listed first for appv4613, followed by the requirements for versions that preceded App-V 4.6 SP2.

segment.source: The Application Virtualization (App-V) Client for Remote Desktop Services requires no additional processor or RAM resources beyond the requirements of the host operating system.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization (App-V) Client for Remote Desktop Services requires no additional processor or RAM resources beyond the requirements of the host operating system.

segment.source: The hardware requirements requirements are applicable to all versions.
segment.target: The hardware requirements requirements are applicable to all versions.

segment.source: Processor—See recommended system requirements for the operating system you are using.
segment.target: Processor—See recommended system requirements for the operating system you are using.

segment.source: RAM—See recommended system requirements for the operating system you are using.
segment.target: RAM—See recommended system requirements for the operating system you are using.

segment.source: These requirements also depend on the number of users and applications.
segment.target: These requirements also depend on the number of users and applications.

segment.source: Disk—30 MB for installation and 6 GB for the cache.
segment.target: Disk—30 MB for installation and 6 GB for the cache.

segment.source: Standard Edition, Enterprise Edition, or Datacenter Edition
segment.target: Standard Edition, Enterprise Edition, or Datacenter Edition
